item.description:
I hear this is actually a nice place to visit, and since the whole of East Boston is still terra incognita, lets go check it out! We will walk around Deer Island and along the waterfront in Winthrop.

Meet at 10:30 in the Deer Island parking lot at the end of Tafts ave.

http://www.bostonharb...

Guided tour:
http://walkboston.org...

Afterwards we will go for authentic Italian at D'Parma. This restaurant is BYOB, in case anyone wants to bring a bottle of wine.

http://www.hiddenbost...

D'Parma
467 Shirley Street, Winthrop, MA 02152
(617) 846-5867
item.name: Deer Island /Winthrop walk
